document.title: Intel® Optane™ PMem Management Software Advisory

notes.title: Summary
notes.text: A potential security vulnerability in some Intel® Optane™ Persistent Memory (PMem) management software may allow denial of service. Intel is releasing software updates to mitigate these potential vulnerabilities.

notes.title: Recommendation
notes.text:
Intel recommends updating Intel® Series management software on Optane™ PMem to version CR_MGMT_02.00.00.4040, CR_MGMT_03.00.00.0499 or later
Updates are available for download at this location:  https://github.com/intel/ipmctl/releases

names: Intel would like to thank @j00sean for reporting this issue. Intel, and nearly the entire technology industry, follows a disclosure practice called Coordinated Disclosure, under which a cybersecurity vulnerability is generally publicly disclosed only after mitigations are available.

vulnerabilities.title: NULL pointer dereference in some Intel® Optane™ PMem Management software versions before CR_MGMT_02.00.00.4040, CR_MGMT_03.00.00.0499  may allow a authenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via local access.
